org.lenskit.basic

Class AbstractRatingPredictor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lenskit.basic.AbstractRatingPredictor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RatingPredictor
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    KnownRatingRatingPredictor, OrdRecRatingPredictor, QuantizedRatingPredictor

    public abstract class AbstractRatingPredictor
extends Object
implements RatingPredictor

    Base class to make item scorers easier to implement. Delegates all score methods to RatingPredictor.predictWithDetails(long, Collection).

    Since:
    3.0

    • Method Detail

      • predict

        public Result predict(long user,
                      long item)

        Predict a user’s rating for a single item.

        This implementation delegates to RatingPredictor.predictWithDetails(long, Collection).

        Specified by:
        predict in interface RatingPredictor
        Parameters:
        user - The user ID for whom to generate a prediction.
        item - The item ID whose rating is to be predicted.
        Returns:
        The predicted preference, or Double.NaN if no preference can be predicted.

      • predict

        @Nonnull
public Map<Long,Double> predict(long user,
                                          @Nonnull
                                          Collection<Long> items)

        Predict the user’s preference for a collection of items.

        This implementation delegates to RatingPredictor.predictWithDetails(long, Collection).

        Specified by:
        predict in interface RatingPredictor
        Parameters:
        user - The user ID for whom to generate predicts.
        items - The items to predict for.
        Returns:
        A mapping from item IDs to predicted preference. This mapping may not contain all requested items.
